org.microbean.jpa.org.eclipse.persistence.platform.server.cdi

Class CDISEPlatform.TransactionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.persistence.transaction.AbstractTransactionController
      • org.eclipse.persistence.transaction.JTATransactionController
        • org.microbean.jpa.org.eclipse.persistence.platform.server.cdi.CDISEPlatform.TransactionController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExternalTransactionController
    Enclosing class:
    CDISEPlatform

    public static final class CDISEPlatform.TransactionController
extends JTATransactionController
    A JTATransactionController whose acquireTransactionManager() uses CDI, not JNDI, to return a TransactionManager instance.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson
    See Also:
    acquireTransactionManager(), JTATransactionController
